topics.body: What is cheerwine
topics.author: 5007bbdf7f123b112f00023a

topics.body:
"@PaskaNaakka":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55947ca763687201db000531#post_55947ca763687201db000531
Cheerwine is a very old soda that was developed an bottled in North Carolina. It doesn't get shipped internationally or to even a lot of northern states. It's the world's first cherry soda and it's more carbonated than usual sodas.
